description: Carved white jade bowl with inscription in four cartouches 'Chien Lung Yu Wan' (made for the emperor Chien Lung). Decoration of trailing branches and four cartouches containing signs of Chinese zodiac. smaller, alternating cartouches bear characters of inscription. Jade worked to great thinness.
markings: Inscription in four cartouches: \'Chien Lung Yu Wan\' (Made for the Emperor Chien Lung).
title: Bowl
